snippet: Six British soldiers got into a fight outside a bar on the East Side, the police said. They face the prospect of short jail terms and possibly discharge from the army, officials said.
abstract: Six British soldiers, members of First Battalion of the Royal Regiment of Scotland, are charged with assaulting an off-duty New York City police officer after fight outside and East Side bar in Manhattan; all six face prospect of short jail terms and possible discharge from British military service.
lead_paragraph: Six British soldiers got into a fight outside a bar on the East Side, the police said. They face the prospect of short jail terms and possibly discharge from the army, officials said.

headline.main: British Soldiers Charged in Assault of Off-Duty Police Officer
headline.print_headline: British Soldiers Charged in Assault of Off-Duty Police Officer
